docs.title: Assignment 2 Overview
docs.text: This repository demonstrates a complete CI/CD pipeline using GitHub Actions for: - Continuous Integration (testing, linting) - Continuous Deployment (Vercel) - Dependency Management - Code Review Automation - Security Scanning - Documentation Deployment

docs.title: Setup Instructions
docs.text:
1. Clone the repository.
  2. Run npm install to install dependencies.
  3. Run npm test to execute unit tests.

docs.title: Usage
docs.text: This application demonstrates a multi-stage CI/CD pipeline using: - Jest for testing - ESLint for linting - GitHub Actions for automation - Vercel for deployment - GitHub Pages for documentation
